Text:
Sorry about the wrong english info
here is the right one ;)

France
Thriller
115 minutes

directed by Alfred Lot
Melanie Laurent, Gilles Lellouche and Eric Caravaca

In full night in a field of windmills, a man driving two unemployed computer down.
Beside him a bag full of banknotes: two million Euro for grabs without
presence of witnesses. What should they do? Call the police or the unique
opportunity. Vigo and Sylvain decide to keep the money. The following day, in
a warehouse near the scene of the accident, the police find the body of
Melody, a blind girl back. Suppose that the money was destined to pay a ransom?
Did the killer seen the occupants of the car?
